title: Welcome to Quartz
content:
This is a blank Quartz installation.
See the [documentation](https://quartz.jzhao.xyz) for how to get started.

/notes/QC/Binary-Encoding.title: Binary Encoding
/notes/QC/Binary-Encoding.content:
Binary values $\vb{x}$ can be encoded into a [[qubit]] bit by bit
$$ \ket{\vb{x}} = \bigotimes_{i=0}^{m} \ket{x_i} \,, $$
where $x_i$ are the bits for the binary value $\vb{x} = (x_0, x_1, x_2, \dots, x_m)$.

/notes/SM/First-Law-of-Thermodynamics.title: First Law of Thermodynamics
/notes/SM/First-Law-of-Thermodynamics.content:
This is a statement of the conservation of energy, which can be summarised by the equation 
$$ \dd{U} = \bar{\dd}Q + \bar{\dd}{W} \,, $$
where $\bar{\dd}$ represents an inexact differential, $U$ is the internal energy, $Q$ is head, and $W$ is work done on the system.
